content: @Brian Postlethwaite & @Brett Esler: It has been suggested that I show some of the prototype work we've been doing in the FHIR logical modelling space at the connectathon next week. Rebecca is okay for me to do it, but says I need to co-ordinate with you on whether or not it's feasible to add it to the programme at this late stage, and, if it is, at what time. I would think I only need 1/2 an hour, although I could stretch it to a whole hour if you need me to. What do you think?

Sounds good to me.
We should have that discussion in the opening of the meeting to see interest and what room we can do this.
I would like to have the developers see that, maybe just after lunch on Monday for the half hour so that they can get an idea what is going on.
http://confluence.hl7australia.com/display/PA/2016+November+WGM+Agenda
Shows that we should be ok with that slot.
Is that Monday Q3 you're suggesting? Anyway, whatever suits you and you think is best, I'm happy to go along with.
